participant_1.background:
I wake up early, work a full day, then practice my music in the evening.
my best friend just moved away.
i wish i made more money.
I'm looking for a home with a large room to build my models in.
I try to live my life as normal as possible, but I have to be more careful now that I'm carrying twins.

participant_2.background:
I would brag about my super cool beach house.
I work out whenever I can to stay in shape and have the energy I need to take care of my family.
I dress in a way that is fun and reflects my personality.
i love 80 s music.
I'm more concerned with my character than my appearance.

content.text: I just found out I'm pregnant with twins!
Oh my goodness, that's exciting! Congratulations!
Thanks! I'm so excited, but also a little nervous.
It's totally normal to be nervous. But I'm sure you'll be great parents.
I hope so! I'm just worried about how I'm going to balance work and taking care of two babies.
It'll be tough, but you can do it! Just take it one day at a time, and ask for help when you need it.
Thanks. I'm going to need all the help I can get!
Of course! And I'm sure your family and friends will be there for you every step of the way.
I know they will. I'm so lucky to have such a great support system.
That's wonderful! So, what are you most looking forward to about being a mom?
Everything! I'm just so excited to meet my babies and start this new chapter in my life.
That's so sweet! I'm sure you'll be a great mom.
